participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Sociable and optimistic, Emily loves exploring new restaurants and enjoys the company of her friends.
participant_1.background: i am 24 years old. i love eating out with friends. i'm getting married in the spring. my favorite singer is taylor swift.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and laid-back, Jake enjoys his job as a manager and appreciates country music.
participant_2.background: i am a convenience store manager. i've short brown hair. i drive a nissan pathfinder. my favourite music is country music. i met taylor swift.
